page.title: 13A HOUSEWIFE'S DAY IN R.STOKE
page.content: Mrs. X is a housewife living in Rodney Stoke. She has 2 young children and has lived here for 2\ years. After rising and getting the breakfast she takes her older child to Play School. She then returns home and spends a good deal of the morning doing housework. Having collected her child from Play School she arranges lunch. In the afternoon she usually visits local friends for a chat and then returns home to prepare tea for her family. She cannot shop in the village since the only shop is a small Post office and this is soon to close down so all provisions must be purchased outside the village in{Wells}or {Cheddar.}Bulk buying and the use of a freezer help to offset the costs of travel involved.
